name: PC Down
short_description:
Many times we just want to leave our computer unattended while it is performing some boring, time consuming, but essential task. Well, the fact is that none of us want to wait causing waste of either time or power. This lightweight application is written to solve that particular dilemma of wasting time or energy. The multiple options in the program enables users to select the particular conditions which can trigger the computer shut down, hibernation, sleep, log off or restart.    
Note:- Some antivirus program will find the program suspicious because it accesses network and cpu details. Just ignore the warning and continue execution.
DO NOT  run in SANDBOX environment of antivirus,  otherwise selected option will NOT be executed.
summary: Automate the task of executing specific user selected power options.
